children.name:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "__count" FROM "offer_range" LEFT OUTER JOIN "offer_rangeproduct" ON ("offer_range"."id" = "offer_rangeproduct"."range_id") LEFT OUTER JOIN "offer_range_included_categories" ON ("offer_range"."id" = "offer_range_included_categories"."range_id") LEFT OUTER JOIN "offer_range_classes" ON ("offer_range"."id" = "offer_range_classes"."range_id") LEFT OUTER JOIN "catalogue_productclass" ON ("offer_range_classes"."productclass_id" = "catalogue_productclass"."id") LEFT OUTER JOIN "catalogue_product" T8 ON ("catalogue_productclass"."id" = T8."product_class_id") WHERE ((NOT (EXISTS(SELECT 1 AS "a" FROM "offer_range_excluded_products" U1 WHERE (U1."product_id" = 974 AND U1."range_id" = ("offer_range"."id")) LIMIT 1) OR EXISTS(SELECT 1 AS "a" FROM "offer_range_excluded_products" U1 WHERE (U1."product_id" = 973 AND U1."range_id" = ("offer_range"."id")) LIMIT 1)) AND "offer_range"."includes_all_products") OR (NOT (EXISTS(SELECT 1 AS "a" FROM "offer_range_excluded_products" U1 WHERE (U1."product_id" = 974 AND U1."range_id" = ("offer_range"."id")) LIMIT 1) OR EXISTS(SELECT 1 AS "a" FROM "offer_range_excluded_products" U1 WHERE (U1."product_id" = 973 AND U1."range_id" = ("offer_range"."id")) LIMIT 1)) AND ("offer_rangeproduct"."product_id" = 974 OR "offer_rangeproduct"."product_id" = 973 OR "offer_range_included_categories"."category_id" IN (
(SELECT "CATALOGUE_CATEGORY_JOIN"."id" FROM "catalogue_category" AS "CATALOGUE_CATEGORY_BASE"
LEFT JOIN "catalogue_category" AS "CATALOGUE_CATEGORY_JOIN" ON (
    "CATALOGUE_CATEGORY_BASE"."path" LIKE "CATALOGUE_CATEGORY_JOIN"."path" || '%'
    AND "CATALOGUE_CATEGORY_BASE"."depth" >= "CATALOGUE_CATEGORY_JOIN"."depth"
)
WHERE "CATALOGUE_CATEGORY_BASE"."id" IN (SELECT U0."category_id" FROM "catalogue_productcategory" U0 INNER JOIN "catalogue_product" U1 ON (U0."product_id" = U1."id") INNER JOIN "catalogue_category" U2 ON (U0."category_id" = U2."id") WHERE U0."product_id" = 973 ORDER BY U1."date_created" DESC, U2."path" ASC))
) OR T8."parent_id" = 973) AND NOT "offer_range"."includes_all_products"))
